channel.title: Notes on My Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on My Blog Site

item.title: Box Plot
item.description: matrix mat <- cbind(Uni05 = (1:100)/21, Norm = rnorm(100), `5T` = rt(100, df = 5), Gam2 = rgamma(100, shape = 2)) boxplot(mat) # directly, calling boxplot.matrix() data.frame df. <- as.data.frame(mat) par(las = 1) # all axis labels horizontal boxplot(df., main = "boxplot(*, horizontal = TRUE)", horizontal = TRUE) formula boxplot(wt ~ cyl, mtcars)
